items.title: Bot Traffic Filtering in Sealmetrics
items.description: Learn how Sealmetrics detects and filters bot traffic without using IP addresses while remaining fully compliant with privacy regulations.

items.title: Data Accuracy & Reconciliation
items.description: Learn how Sealmetrics ensures complete data accuracy and how reconciliation works during processing delays or high-traffic periods.

items.title: Event vs Pageview Processing
items.description: Understand the difference between event processing and pageview processing within Sealmetrics’ privacy-first architecture.

items.title: First Party Tracker
items.description: Learn how SealMetrics’ first-party tracker works and how to install it for better privacy, compliance, and adblocker resistance.

items.title: First Steps Overview
items.description: Start your journey with SealMetrics — from installing your first tracker to seeing real-time, privacy-first analytics in action.

items.title: First Steps with SealMetrics
items.description: Get started with SealMetrics in under 5 minutes — from account setup and tracking installation to your first privacy-first analytics insights.

items.title: How Sealmetrics Consolidates Data
items.description: Learn how Sealmetrics processes and consolidates analytics data, how our queue system works during high-traffic events, and what to expect when traffic spikes occur.

items.title: How Sealmetrics Stores Data
items.description: Learn how Sealmetrics securely processes, stores, anonymizes, and retains analytics data while remaining fully compliant with GDPR, ePrivacy, PECR, and CCPA.

items.title: How SealMetrics Works
items.description: Understand how SealMetrics balances analytics precision with absolute privacy protection, following GDPR, ePrivacy, CCPA, and PECR.

items.title: Quick Journey through the Platform
items.description: A quick walkthrough of the SealMetrics platform — from user management to tracking, cost analysis, and pixel setup.

items.title: SealMetrics Documentation
items.description: Learn how to use SealMetrics — the privacy-first analytics platform that tracks 100% of your data without cookies or consent banners.

items.title: See Your Data Flow in Real-Time with SealMetrics
items.description: Learn how SealMetrics delivers instant, real-time analytics without cookies or consent banners.

items.title: Setting Up Trackers in SealMetrics
items.description: Learn how to configure and set up global and conversion trackers in SealMetrics to start collecting privacy-first analytics data.

items.title: System Performance & Limits
items.description: Learn how Sealmetrics handles processing performance, scaling, infrastructure capacity, and theoretical limits during high-traffic situations.
